ygData.subject: RE: Questions about FEAR PLANE....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Weeeeeeeeeeeeee I am one happy bard tonight :) Got my greaves and breastplate to go with everything else. Now all i need is the arms and gloves and i got
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:42 PM 8/4/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>nice, i will have to relay the info on the phoboplasms. myself and another
>bard have greaves. we have yet to see the bracer and BP. i got a helm
>today (hehe wife at home playing) which is basically worthless unless in DE
>form i guess.
>
>our groups did know that the entire zone needs to be cleared before taking
>on cazic, but damn good job getting him with his 3 goons around. too bad he
>dropped nothing, he usually has something good.
>
>Shada
>

Weeeeeeeeeeeeee

I am one happy bard tonight :)
Got my greaves and breastplate to go with everything else. Now all i need
is the arms and gloves and i got the visible set, course the other bard on
the server has the gloves and arms only....
We also killed more phobo's tonight and they dropped ANOTHER bracer on top
of the two from before. But they didnt drop any other bard armour.


Gendal Concoden, lvl 48 bard of tunare
Who really hates that everything is no drop
